thread.title: Ghanaian midfielder Adu Kofi excels as Malmo net first UEFA Champions League win
thread.title_full: Ghanaian midfielder Adu Kofi excels as Malmo net first UEFA Champions League win

title: Ghanaian midfielder Adu Kofi excels as Malmo net first UEFA Champions League win
text:
Sports News | 22 October 2015 01:40 CET Ghanaian midfielder Adu Kofi excels as Malmo net first UEFA Champions League win - www.ghanasoccernet.com Enoch Adu Kofi 
Ghana midfielder Enoch Adu Kofi excelled as his Swedish club Malmo picked up their first points in this season's Champions League after defeating Shakhtar Donetsk 1-0 in Group A on Wednesday night. 
The enforcer was at his hardworking best when Markus Rosenberg netted the only goal of the game. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
